howItWorks.title: Our Process
howItWorks.description: Professional and transparent shipping process from receiving to delivery completion

step1.title: Create Order
step1.description: Customers register orders online or contact our hotline

step2.title: Receive & Inspect
step2.description: Receive orders and conduct inspections according to customer requirements

step3.title: Sort & Route
step3.description: Transport to warehouse for sorting and routing assignment

step5.title: Delivery & Collection
step5.description: Deliver goods, joint inspection, collect documents as required and update delivery report

step6.title: Report & Complete
step6.description: Compile reports, return delivery reports and records to customers
